title: DIY Makeup Salon: SPA Makeover
description: DIY Makeup Salon: SPA Makeover is a beauty game where you become a make-up stylist. Showcase your skill and do makeovers for these pretty girls! Select the model and pick her stunning color combinations for her. Use various tools and facial cleansers to give your model refreshing and healthy skin. Apply flawless makeup look and hair-do for them! Stay up-to-date with the latest trends in fashion. This game is perfect for you who desire to create the most fashionable looks.
